Truth Seeker Devianne:
Please investigate what's been happening at Phantasmal Ridge. The place is the most lethal in Hellbound, so make sure to take allies!
Hunt Smaugs, Lunatikans, Jabberwoks, Kanzaroths, Kandiloths, Garions, Garion Netis, Desert Wendigos, Korazas, and Bend Beetles, and see if anything suspicious happens.
